attributes.action: Give power to the government to be able to enforce correct usage of the London phone code as 020 not 0207 or 0208
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The incorrect usage of the London phone code must end. It is 020 not 0208 or 0207. If you are inside the London area and you dialled the number without the code believing it to be 0207 you do not get through. This misuse is rife, from van liveries to signage and print.
